channel.title: English self-learning on naomori's Diary
channel.description: Recent content in English self-learning on naomori's Diary

item.title: 2020-10-07: English
item.description: Today I worked from home as usual. It’s getting dark earlier. Now sunrise is at five thirty and sunset is at around five. By the way, a typhoon is coming. So, waves are getting bigger. It’s good to surf. Rainy or sunny doesn’t matter for suring. That’s the nice thing about surfing. I don’t like jogging under rain. However, I don’t care about rain during surfing. Speaking: 4-31 Try.1 They believe she will come on the time.

item.title: 2020-10-06: English
item.description: Speaking: 4-30 Try.1 They are going to stay at the hotel next week. Who opened the door? The boy was pale. I have many things to learn. He’s always with Tom. I wonder what flower that is. That is the restaurant which is opened last month. Has the boy already become as tall as his father yet? Yes, he has. How old is was he when he wrote that poem?

item.title: 2020-10-05: English
item.description: How am I donig today? I’m doing good. Last Saturday, I had my hair cut. I feel my head became lighter than before. And it’s good for surfing. Did I mention my plan to go on a trip to Okinawa before? I’m decided to go on a trip to Okinawa next January. My wife’s birthday is in January. The reason I decided to go on the trip is because I’m little bored of staying home and I want to go somewhere with Japanese government support.

item.title: 2020-10-04: English
item.description: Sepaking: 4-(26-29) Traiing (26-29) Try.1 She went back to England for Christmas. That woman can speak twenty languages. I think she is older than Tom. What he said may be true. That cat which is sleeping on the sofa is Tama. Peter is the tallest student in this school. She is as beautiful as a rose.

item.title: 2020-10-03: English
item.description: Sepaking: 4-(26-29) Traiing (26-29) Try.1 It is true that he said. What he said may be true. The cat which is sleeping on the sofa is Tama. She is as beautiful as a rose. That woman can speak twenty languages. Peter is the tallest student in this school. When did he go to India? I think that she is older than Tom.

item.title: 2020-10-02: English
item.description: Sepaking: 4-29 Traiing 29 Try.1 I want you to listen to this song once again. Bob’s car was out of order in a way to there. Bob’s car broke down on the way there. That is the a chair my son made. I want to take my wife to Paris. You must not smoke here. Where did your daughter find this book? She will never see them again.

item.title: 2020-10-01: English Review
item.description: Review today’s lesson Vocabulary Phrasal verbs come over to visit someone at their house come along to go somewhere with someone come apart/off to become separated or removed from something come off if something that has been planned comes off, it happens to be successful come around/round (America) become conscious again after you have been unconscious (British) to visit someone at their house (British) to change your opinion so that you now agree with someone or are no longer angry with them come out if something comes out, it is removed from a place if information comes out, people learn about it, especially after it has been kept secret if a photograph comes out, it shows a clear picture if a book, record etc comes out, it becomes publicly available come off to be successful if something that has been planned comes off, it happens come about to happen, especially in a way that is not planned come up if a subject comes up, people mention it and discuss it if a problem or difficulty comes up, it appears or starts to affect you if a job or an opportunity comes up, it becomes available come up against something/somebody to have to deal with problems or difficulties come across somebody/something to meet, find, or discover someone or something by chance come down to accept a lower price to fail to the ground come to come to a decision/conclusion/agreement etc to decide something, agree on something etc after considering or discussing a situation Examples using phrasal verbs I learned come over I rarely ask my friends to come over.

item.title: 2020-10-01: English
item.description: Sepaking: 4-28 Traiing 28 Try.1 The girl had a busket basket which is was full of flowers. Where did you see his sister? She prefers Winter to Summer. She likes winter better than summer. What did he say somthing? Did he say antyhing? Were there a lot of things in that town that you should see? Were there many things to see in that town?

item.title: 2020-09-30: English
item.description: Speaking: 4-27 Training 27 Try.1 I have never read the poem. She saw lookep up at the shining star. That is the man everyone in the town respects. Why did Tom eat nothing yesterday? It will be so fun that you study in this school. It will be a lot of fun to study at this school. He had enough money to buy the house. You must do your homework before you watch TV.

item.title: 2020-09-29: English Listeing&Writing
item.description: Listening Unit 4 Mode.1 He hasn’t been very effective either domestic or international issues. The next president should handling with the following things. domestic issue national security education international relation crime employment violence credit Because the education system isn’t working. Mode.2 He thinks that the president hasn’t been very effective either domestic or international issues. The think that the next president should do something about the following things.

item.title: 2020-09-29: English
item.description: Review 09/29 lesson Vocabulary stuck in a rut too fixed in one particular type of job, activity, method, etc., and needing to change habit something that you do often and regularly, sometimes without knowing that you are doing it dwelling a house or place to live in nerd a person, especially a man, who is not attractive and is awkward or socially embarrassing deprived not having the things that are necessary for a pleasant life, such as enough money, food, or good living conditions Examples using the vocabulary If you feel stuck in a rut, you’d better to break your bad habit.

item.title: 2020-09-28: English
item.description: Speaking: Unit21-25 When did it begin to snow? Is that old man his grandfather? Yes, he is. The girl riding the horse is Emily. I know all of them. She will never forget the man who she met at the party. This is a poem written by a famous poet. The movie that we watched last week was very interesting.

item.title: 2020-09-27: English
item.description: Review 09/25 Lesson Homework What are the advantages and disadvantages of virtual tourism? The advantages of it is that you can go everywhere you want to. The disadvantage of it is that you can’t touch anything in there. Vocabulary curvatures revitalize employ conformal account for in person Today I’m relaxed today. I was watching the TV drama series, Friends. I want to watch it without subtitles, however I can’t yet now.

item.title: 2020-09-26: English
item.description: Speaking: 4-25 Training 25 Try.1 How many roses did you he buy there? He went to drink with his friends last night. He went for a drink with his friends last night. Who woke up the baby? Do you know someone anyone who can speak English and Chinese? Do you know anyone who can speak English and Chinese? When did Mr.Brown quit smoking? When did Mr.

item.title: 2020-09-25: English
item.description: Speaking: 4-24 Training 24 Try.1 Is he taking a shower? No, he isn’t. This stone is heavier than that one. Did you eat meat yesterday? Do you want to go to the sea in this afternoon? Yes, I do. My husband enjoys listening to jazz before sleeping he goes to bed. I come home before seven o’clock. I will be home before seven.

item.title: 2020-09-24: English
item.description: Review 09/21 Lesson The Greatest Wealth is Health You can’t do anything if you are unhealthy. Unhealthiness demotivate you and you can’t do even what you like. Even If you were so rich that you can buy everything, you can’t buy your health. Therefore, people say that the greatest wealth is health. Vocabulary nutritional relating to the substances in food that help you to stay healthy regardless without being affected or influenced by something significant having an important effect or influence, especially on what will happen in the future induce to cause a particular physical condition demotivate to make people less willing to do their job Examples of using vocabulary I learned I’m learning new technology regardless of my task.

item.title: 2020-09-23: English
item.description: Speaking: 4-22 Training 22 Try.1 Who is the pretty girl whom you were talking to? What were you doing with him at that time then? This work is so important that we must finish it first. As this work is very important, we have to finish it first. Do Can you see the dog running in the park? Can you see the dog which running in the park?

item.title: 2020-09-22: English
item.description: Speaking: 4-21 Training 21 Try.1 I know all of them. She was doing the her homework in her room at that time. The movie that we watched last week was very interesting. When did it begin to snow? She will not ever never forget the man who she met at the party. Is the that old man his grandfather? Yes, he is. This is the poem that the famous poet wrote.

item.title: 2020 09 21 English
item.description: Writing: 23rd February, 2020 - Big breakfasts help us burn double the calories Discussion a) What do you think of your weight? I think I would better reduce my weight. Because my weight is heavier than the average people who are the same height as I. However, in my opinion, even if you have more weight, it’s good provided that you’re healthy and feeling good. Because it’s important not only to be physical healthy but also mental healthy.

item.title: 2020-09-20: English
item.description: Review 09/18 lesson Home work I can’t read the article unless you allow me to read it. In Singapore, the word ‘no’ is considered impolite. Yes, it is. Because they will sometimes say ‘yes’ to avoid causing offence. In Greece, you should nod your head upwards to say ‘yes’ No, you shouldn’t. Because the Greeks traditionally nod the head upwards to say ‘no’. They use a tilt of the head from side to side to mean ‘yes’.

item.title: 2020-09-19: English
item.description: Review 09/18 Lesson They are what I couldn’t say what I wanted to say. Why did the current prime minister of Japan quit? It’s because he has a health problem and it has been worse, so he decided not to keep his post. He has been the prime minister before at once, it was fourteen years ago. He resigned from his post at that time because of his health problem. That is to say, he resigned twice from the prime minister.

item.title: 2020-09-18: English
item.description: Speaking: 4-20 Training 20 Try.1 Is your brother stronger than you? Yes, he is. Are you going to meet him tomorrow? Yes, I am. Lucy is in her room. You will be feel much better tomorrow than today. You will feel much better tomorrow than today. How many times did you go to the store last week? This book is more difficult than that book one.

item.title: 2020-09-17: English
item.description: Speaking: 4-19 Training 19 Try.1 Tom is the youngest among the three. Tom was the youngest of the three. Those children are very smart. Treat Betty kind. Be nice to Betty. Why did you tell your wife such a thing? Why did you say such a thing to your wife? France is the contry where my wife wants to go. I read this book twice.

item.title: 2020-09-16: English
item.description: Speaking: 4-18 Training 18 Try.1 He went to Spain to watch see a soccer games. She earns more money than her husband. This is the bag which my grandfather bought for me. Is it cool now in Japan? Yes, it is. He tried to solve the problem again. It’s so cold that I want something hot to drink. It was snowing at that night when I and my girlfriend had dinner at the restaurant.

item.title: 2020-09-15: English
item.description: Speaking: 4-17 Training 17 Try.1 Are you with your wife now? Yes, I am. Who is the person who runs the fastest in the world? Who runs the fastest in the world? Where are you going to go with your wife this night tonight? Are Were there a lot of people in at the party? Does your wife often ask you to take her to a restaurants?

item.title: 2020-09-14: English
item.description: Writing: 12th August, 2020 - Delivery of COVID vaccine needs 8,000 jumbo jets Summary Whenever a vaccine for COVID-19 is created, distributing the vaccine will have three big problems. Firstly, the air cargo industry have no experience that deliver 8,000 flights at once. Scientists says that to transport the vaccine across the globe will require around 8,000 flight planes. Secondly, the vaccine requires keeping at the same temperature throughout its journey.

item.title: 2020-09-13: English
item.description: Review the previous lesson(9/11) If you were to travel this year, where would you like to go? If I were to travel this year, I’d like to go to Iceland. Because Iceland has great nature. For instance it has volcanoes, glaciers, fiord, and aurora. Therefore, I want to go on a trip to Iceland, I can’t go there now due to COVID-19, though. How about if you have these four choices, which would you choose?

item.title: 2020-09-12: English
item.description: Speaking: 4-(13-16) Training (13-16) Try.1 After he did his homework, the boy played with his friends at in the park. They look very happy. Mr.Green lives in the wonderful house that has a beautiful garden. Mary is as beautiful as Nancy. Does he work longer than the other people? Yes, he does. There will be a lot of people here tomorrow.

item.title: 2020-09-11: English
item.description: Review the last lesson I’m bad at pronounce /l/ and /r/ sound. I can’t recognize the differences between them. So, I need to practice more about that. I’ll use englishclub.com for that. Vocabulary gum ridge a ridge that forms the borders of the upper and lower jaws and contains the sockets of the teeth. Speaking: 4-16 Training 16 Try.1 My wife has been to Spain many times.

item.title: 2020-09-10: English
item.description: Speaking: 4-15 Training 15 Try.1 Is her mother beautiful? Yes, she is. She wants to see him as often as (possible/she can). It is will be difficult to see meet the man. My father is reading the newspaper now. Are Is there anything to eat in the house at home ? When will do the leaves turn to yellow? I’ve never seen met her. He is the an actor who whom/that everyone knows.

item.title: 2020-09-09: English
item.description: Speaking: 4-14 Training 14 Try.1 Has Did that boy who speaks English well lived live in America for a long time? What time does your brother usually go to bed? How did you see him? How did you get to know him? Who is that tall boy? He is Peter. He was running in the park. Who is the oldest person in this village?

item.title: 2020-09-08: English
item.description: Speaking 4-13 Training 13 Try.1 He was going to visit his grand-mother that day. Did Do you often stay at this hotel? Yes, I did do. Mr. Green lives at the in the wonderful house that have has a beautiful garden. Tell me where you found it. Does he work longer than others the other people? Yes, he does. There will be many/a lot of people here tomorrow.

item.title: 2020-09-07: English
item.description: Speaking: 4-(9-12) Training (9-12) 4-9 This novel is read in many countries. When the telephone rang, she woke up at once. Is it necessary for the children to read these books? The student who speaks English best in this class is Ken. After they had dinner, they enjoyed dancing. He asked her where she was going. I’m going to write a few letters this afternoon. Would you bring three chairs, please?

item.title: 2020-09-06: English
item.description: Review 09/04 lesson Speech Pattern OREO O - in my opinion / I think / It seems like / I don’t think / If you ask me / It seems to me that / R - because / as / since / due to E - for example / for instance / a good example is O - In conclusion / so / therefore / to conclude / finally Vocabulary tariff a tax on goods coming into a country or going out of a country ally a country that agrees to help or support another country in a war postpone to change the date or time of a planned event or action to a later one Homework: Will life be the same after this Pandemic?

item.title: 2020-09-05: English
item.description: Writing: 6th February, 2019 - We may be able to learn vocabulary while sleeping. Summary We may be able to learn vocabulary while sleeping. Because our brain cells are active for a short period of time even while sleeping. The researchers are thinking that our brain can learn new vocabulary while the period of time. Discussion a. How important is sleeping? It’s the most important for us to spend a comfortable day.

item.title: 2020-09-04: English
item.description: Speaking: 4-12 Training 12 Try.1 Is The girl singing on the stage Nancy? The doll began to move suddenly. The This ring is too expensive for me to buy. Would you paint these walls in white, please? Don’t open this door. You must not open this door. That language is not spoken now. Where did you buy that sweater? I’d like to arrive there before it begins to rain.

item.title: 2020-09-03: English
item.description: Speaking: 4-11 Training 11 Try.1 The cat is was loved by everyone. He can jump higher than you. It is was boring for her to study the subject. This book is hers. Could you take care of my cat, when I leave home? Will you please take care of my cat while I am away? Would you take care of my cat while I’m away? My son is talking with someone via the telephone now.

item.title: 2020-09-02: English
item.description: Speaking: Unit.10 Try.1 After he took a bath, he drank a glass of beer. Do I have to buy this book? Do I need to buy this book? No, you don’t. Where will you eat dinner? Where are you going to have dinner? Don’t left leave the door open. The tree is was too high for the boy to climb. He had a the weighter bring a cup glass of water.

item.title: 2020-09-01: English
item.description: Review the yesterday’s lesson. I couldn’t talk well the following things. My history about workplace, university and graduate school in my self-introduction Why do I prefer rural to urban? I began to work at Meguro, Tokyo after graduate school. About two years later, I changed my job. Because I wanted to develop software. I had deployed, manage and operate server and network, however, I found that I liked also programming as well as managing network and server.

item.title: 2020-08-30: English
item.description: Speaking: 1-9 Training 9 try.1 Writing: 31st August, 2020 - Brain-hacking chip could give up superpowers. a. My favorite technology trailblazers are Steve Jobs, Jeff Bezos, and of course Elon Musk. Because they deliver new experiences to us. b. I don’t know him very much. What I know about him are that he manufactures electric vehicles and rockets. c. Yes, it is. I feel it’s too fast to catch up with it.

item.title: 2020-08-29: English
item.description: Speaking: 1-9 Training 9 try.1 The dress is was too big for her to wear. How boring this film is! what a boring movie this is! Could you bring us breakfast, please? Will you please bring us breakfast? Yes, I do. Certainly. After calling to his wife, he left the office. He left the office after he called his wife. Didn’t she get surprised?

item.title: 2020-08-28: English
item.description: Speaking: 1-8 Training 8 try.1 The garden is covered with flowers. The old man likes taking a walk along with the river after breakfast. She thinks that she is right. I have just cleaned the my room. Haven’t you done your homework yet*? No, I haven’t. Have you been spoken by foreigners? Have you ever been spoken to by a foreigner? He was gave a cup of coffee by his daughter.

item.title: 2020-08-27: English
item.description: Speaking: 1-7 Training 7 Your grand mother should will be glad to see you. He is same as smart as you. Call him, or he gets will get angry. Should Must we buy all these books? Do we have to buy all these books? What is cheese made from? Do you think that it will rain in the afternoon? Are those girls his daughters? Yes, they are.

item.title: 2020-08-26: English
item.description: Speaking: 1-6 Training 6 She is too young to live alone. She may be sad. How do did you learn Chinese? Isn’t your wife Japanese? No, she isn’t. What time did he come home? What time was it when he came back? Do you see the open window? Do you see the room the window of which is open? My brother has been studying Mathematics since he got up.

item.title: 2020-08-25: English
item.description: Daily Routine Goals Talk about my daily routine in chronological order. Familiarize phrases or verbs for daily routine. Use the present simple form of the verb in talking about my daily routine. My routine I’m not a morning person, but I usually wake up at around 6:30, because my alarm works snooze function, that is, it alarms again and again. I get up at around 7:00 in the morning, after that I brush my teeth and wash my face.

item.title: 2020-08-23: English
item.description: 1~4. Training-1~4 Writing Does he know where to go? Yes, he does. I went to the library yesterday. Who cooked this? I did. They all know the truth. Ellen may be angry. Do I have to read the book? Yes, you do. How long have you lived in this country? They began to sing then. My wife wants to go on a trip to Kyoto.

item.title: 2020-08-22: English
item.description: 1~4. Training-1~4 Writing My wife wants to go on a trip to Kyoto. Does he know where to go? Yes, he does. I went to the library yesterday. They all know the truth. Who cooked this? I did. Ellen may be angry. How long have you lived in this country? Do I have to read this book? Yes, you do. Would you pass me the salt, please?

item.title: 2020-08-21: English
item.description: 1-4. Training-4 trial.1 Learning/Studying foreign languages is interesting. Study harder, or you will fail the exam. Study harder, or you will fail (in) the examination. How many cups of coffee do you drink a day? Does your dog eat fish? There must be snow in New York. It must be snowing in New York. Does Doesn’t he speak Japanese? No, he doesn’t. How bright is the star that star is!

item.title: 2020-08-20: English
item.description: 1-3. Training-3 trial.1 He was angry at last. At last he got angry. The teacher likes students who study hard. Was he not in his room? Wasn’t he in his room? No, he wasn’t. I made him read the book. How tall the those boys are! He went to a the park to meet see her. They heard that she cried. They heard her cry.

item.title: 2020-08-19: English self-learning
item.description: 1-2. Training-2 trial.1 Is your son tall? Yes, he is. Does your sister often go there? Yes, she does. Could you show us the picture? Please show us the picture? Does he work here? No, he doesn’t. Is she your sister? No, she isn’t. Jump high as possible as you can. Jump as high as you can.

item.title: 2020-08-18: English self-learning
item.description: 1-1. Training-1 trial.1 Who cooked this? I do did. I went to the library yesterday. Does he know where he goes to go? Yes, he does. How long have you lived in this country? Ellen may be angry. Could you take me the salt? or Will you please pass me the salt? Sure. At that time, they started to sing. They began to sing then.
